requirement.en: If you have 10 or more cards in your Deck, send up to 3 cards from the top of your Deck to the Graveyard.

effect.en: This card gains ATK equal to [the number of cards sent to the Graveyard to meet the requirement] x 500 until the end of this turn. Then, you can send this card from your field to the Graveyard. Then, if you sent this card to the Graveyard by this effect, draw 1 card.
